content.raw: Not sure if it's expected or a bug in another piece of software: when I place Atlas on the rough terrain and it falls, try to recover it with the keyboard teleop (pressing "r") will elevate the robot several meters in the sky, instead of recovering it from just few centimetres above the floor. If I do the same in the black surface at the start (asphalt?) the problem does not happen and the robot is recovered as usual.
content.html: Not sure if it's expected or a bug in another piece of software: when I place Atlas on the rough terrain and it falls, try to recover it with the keyboard teleop (pressing "r") will elevate the robot several meters in the sky, instead of recovering it from just few centimetres above the floor. If I do the same in the black surface at the start (asphalt?) the problem does not happen and the robot is recovered as usual.
